com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.utils

Class CreeperMessenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.utils.CreeperMessenger

  • public abstract class CreeperMessenger
extends Object
    A class to handle custom messages to players.
    Author:
    nitnelave

    • Method Detail

      • processMessage

        public static String processMessage(String type,
                    String... values)
        Create a formatted string ready for sending to a player or to the console. All the instances of formatting keywords are replaced by the values provided if specified.
        Parameters:
        type - The message type, corresponding to the property key in the file.
        values - Values to replace the formatting keywords.
        Returns:
        A formatted string for chat.

      • warn

        public static void warn(CreeperPlayer.WarningCause cause,
        org.bukkit.entity.Player offender,
        boolean blocked,
        String material)
        Send a warning to a player, and alert all those concerned by the message.
        Parameters:
        cause - The reason for the message.
        offender - The offending player.
        blocked - Whether the action was blocked.
        material - Some info about the message.

      • removeFromWarnList

        public static void removeFromWarnList(CreeperPlayer player)
        Remove a player from the list of players that are warned of an infraction.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to remove.

      • registerPlayer

        public static void registerPlayer(CreeperPlayer player)
        Check if the player can be warned about infractions, and register him.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to add.
